authors: Willem den Besten (Morenim), and Devindra Payment (@Ardnived)
instructions: The sheet can store all information required for a Dungeon World character. It provides roll buttons for damage and rolling +MOD. As a new feature it auto-calculates the modifiers. The new checkboxes can be used to show/hide information such as the base load, base health, and move descriptions. Warning: the modifier names were changed, so be sure to update any macros! Enjoy. :)
